Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS_00>Huh?!<sp:5:0:0> There was something blocking the
top of the Skyview Tower?

<sp:3:0:2:0701>Hmm. The terminal and the lid on top
of the tower are connected...

<sp:3:0:2:0701>So if the lid wouldn't work because it
was blocked, <sp:5:0:0>I guess the terminal
wouldn't work either.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Well. <sp:5:1:0>I'm in a hurry, and everything seems
to be working properly, <sp:5:0:0>so I'll head out.

<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>Thank you for fixing the Skyview Tower.
I'm off!
Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad_00>Well, <sp:5:0:0>the terminal that starts up the
Skyview Tower isn't working.

I've checked all the terminal's parts,<sp:5:0:0>
but nothing looks broken.
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Think_01>I wonder if something to do with the
tower itself is broken.
Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Think_00>Sorry. This Skyview Tower is out of order<sp:5:1:0>
and maintenance is proving tricky.
Talk_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I came to repair this Skyview Tower, but
the terminal hasn't been working.

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Until now! It started working again...<sp:5:0:0>even
without me doing anything!
Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseM_01>The terminal! It's working again!<sp:5:1:0> Even
though I didn't do anything...
